SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.reportviews

Class DateTransactionCurrencypairMap

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reportviews.DateTransactionCurrencypairMap
public class DateTransactionCurrencypairMap extends Object
Central repository for currency exchange rate data used in financial reports that calculate values in a main currency. Provides access to historical currency conversion rates and manages currency pair mappings for multi-currency portfolio calculations.

This class serves as the primary interface for retrieving exchange rates needed to convert foreign currency transactions and positions to a tenant's or portfolio's main currency. It maintains both historical end-of-day rates and current market rates with intelligent fallback mechanisms for missing data.

Key Features:

  • Historical exchange rate lookup by date and currency pair
  • Intelligent fallback to current rates when historical data is missing
  • Trading day awareness with weekend and holiday handling
  • Multiple currency pair lookup methods (by currencies, by ID)
  • Configurable behavior for fee and interest calculations

Rate Resolution Strategy:

  • Primary: Historical end-of-day rate for the specific date
  • Fallback: Current market rate if historical data unavailable and within acceptable timeframe
  • Error: Throws exception if required rate missing on trading days

The class is designed for use in financial reporting where accurate currency conversion is critical for portfolio valuation, performance calculations, and regulatory reporting.

  • Constructor Details

    • DateTransactionCurrencypairMap

      public DateTransactionCurrencypairMap(Date untilDate, boolean hasTradingDaysBetweenUntilDateAndYesterday)

    • DateTransactionCurrencypairMap

      public DateTransactionCurrencypairMap(String mainCurrency, Date untilDate, List<Object[]> dateTransactionCurrency, List<Currencypair> currencypairs, boolean hasTradingDaysBetweenUntilDateAndYesterday, boolean useUntilDateForFeeAndInterest)
      Creates a comprehensive currency map with exchange rate data and currency pair information. This is the primary constructor used for multi-currency financial reporting.
      Parameters:
      mainCurrency - the main currency of the tenant or portfolio (target currency for conversions)
      untilDate - the latest date included in the report period
      dateTransactionCurrency - historical exchange rate data as Object arrays containing [Date, String, Double]
      currencypairs - list of currency pairs used by the tenant or portfolio
      hasTradingDaysBetweenUntilDateAndYesterday - whether trading days exist between until date and yesterday
      useUntilDateForFeeAndInterest - whether to use until date for fee and interest rate calculations

    • DateTransactionCurrencypairMap

      public DateTransactionCurrencypairMap(String mainCurrency, Date untilDate, List<Object[]> dateTransactionCurrency, List<Currencypair> currencypairs, boolean hasTradingDaysBetweenUntilDateAndYesterday)

    • putToDateFromCurrencyMap

      public void putToDateFromCurrencyMap(List<Object[]> dateCurrency)
      Populates the internal exchange rate maps from the provided historical data. Processes Object arrays containing date, currency, and rate information.
      Parameters:
      dateCurrency - list of Object arrays with [Date, String, Double] representing exchange rates

    • getPriceByDateAndFromCurrency

      public Double getPriceByDateAndFromCurrency(Date date, String fromCurrency, boolean required)
      Retrieves the exchange rate from a source currency to the main currency for a specific date. Uses intelligent fallback logic when exact date data is not available.
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to retrieve the exchange rate
      fromCurrency - the source currency to convert from
      required - whether the rate is required (throws exception if missing and true)
      Returns:
      exchange rate from source currency to main currency, or null if not found and not required
      Throws:
      DataViolationException - if required rate is missing

    • getExactDateAndFromCurrency

      public Double getExactDateAndFromCurrency(Date date, String fromCurrency)
      Attempts to find the exact exchange rate for a specific date and currency. Falls back to current rates if historical data is missing and conditions permit.
      Parameters:
      date - the date for which to find the exchange rate
      fromCurrency - the source currency
      Returns:
      exchange rate if found, null otherwise
